interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L’Ange Hair Le Rêve Titanium Straightener - 2 in 1 Ceramic Hair Straightener - Titanium Hair Straightener with Dual Voltage - Ionic Straightener with Digital Display - 1“ Plate, MSRP $179.00
Review Date: 2020/03/02
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Material': 'Titanium', 'Color': 'Black', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Package Dimensions': '14.37 x 5.12 x 2.4 inches; 1.67 Pounds', 'UPC': '797822150043', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Review Text: I am so happy that I finally have a flat iron to take with me when I travel to Greece this spring, it is my 1st dual voltage hair appliance so I am quite excited to test it out there.  My hair has a mind of its own, so I have to keep it straightened. It is pretty light weight and I really like the black color with the rose gold accents.  It heats up very fast and really left my hair smooth and silky. So far I am very happy with it and to me the true test will be when I go overseas. As you can see in my picture it has an infrared light strip in the center of  the straightener.
Review Title: DUAL VOLTAGE HAIR STRAIGHTENER
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Silicone Makeup Sponge 2 Pack Premium Quality Silisponge -Easy To Wash Beauty Sponge Applicator for Flawless Application of Liquid Foundation,Primer, Concealer by SEALUXE
SEALUXE
{'Brand': 'SEALUXE', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.5 x 3.5 x 0.6 inches', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup'}
My 18 year old grand daughter does her full face make up everyday whether she is leaving the house or not. I will admit she is pretty good at it, but she does spend alot of money on it. She had been using a sponge type and what she said that she really likes about this blender is that there is alot less waste of makeup, since the sponge absorbs it and this silicone blender spreads it. She said it spreads alot more evenly also and she was very happy with how she could clean it easily in water after each use.
SPREADS EVENLY & CLEANS EASILY
Leyla Milani Hair Styling Spray - Professional Extra Firm Hold Flexible Hairspray, 3-Level Adjustable Nozzle, Best Heat Resistant Anti-Humidity Finishing Hair Sprays, Hold it Right There (10oz)
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '10 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 1.7 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
I have kind of fine hair, but it is like I have alot of it. My hair normally when I curl it is flat within 1 hour tops. Even when I use hair spray, to even get it to hold I have to use alot of hairspray and then my hair feels so stiff and gross looking. This hair spray held my hair all day long and my hair was not at all stiff or hard or sticky, it was very free flowing. I absolutely love the smell of this hair spray. You adjust the spray flow on the nozzle. So depending on how I want my hair to be for the day is whether I use  the light, the medium or the high spray.
HELD MY HAIR CURLS ALL DAY LONG & SMELLS GREAT
Leyla Milani Hair - Heat Protecting Anti Frizz Shine & Thermal Spray Alcohol-Free, Clean Melon Scent, Hair Repair - Glossilocks Spray - msrp $23
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '4.75 Ounce'}
I have very dull and lifeless hair, I think it is from too much sun and abuse growing up My hair is light weight but very frizzy so I have to use straighteners or curling irons to have it look decent. This has definitely made my hair shiny and looking great. I just sprayed it on damp hair, I combed it through and then I used a flat iron and I have also used it with the curling iron and I loved the outcome. My hair definitely had alot more life to it. I think if your hair looks good you feel good about yourself. The smell of this spray is amazing, it is like a fresh melon scent. It is super easy to use and I love that it gives my hair a layer of protection from the heated hair appliances and the sun. It is for all hair types and it is very light weight.
FANTASTIC SCENT & LOVING THE SHINY HAIR
Tanali Contour Highlighter Powder Palette -4 Color Matte Glitter Foundation Face Makeup Compact Set (#2)
{'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Style': 'Compact', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 4.41 x 0.98 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '712069255788'}
My grand daughter used this on many different areas of her body for high lighting purposes. She really liked it. Said it went on easily and stayed on. She is very fair skinned so it looked really nice and stood out. You get 4 colors and they are a matte with a sparklyness to it. It is a compact design and worked great for contouring also. She had no irritations or problems with it.
LOVE IT
Leyla Milani Hair Straightener Flat-Iron - 1 Inch Professional Ceramic Tourmaline Dual Voltage Hair-Straightening-Irons, Best Styling Tools, LCD Display Adjustable Temp | Give it to Me Straight - $110
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Package Dimensions': '13.75 x 4.6 x 2.75 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '855389006460'}
My husband and I are getting ready to take a trip abroad. I was worried about what I would use on my hair, because it has a mind of its own. He surprised me and bought me this flat iron for our trip since it is dual voltage. I have thin hair, but I have a lot of hair and with this having temperatures from 230 to 450 degrees I usually only have to set it at 350 for my type of hair to get it straight. It have a very nice LCD display that is very easy to read. This is a 1 inch ceramic tourmaline flat iron. It worked great in my hair making it very soft, shiny and smooth and it was done very quickly. I also like that it has an auto shut off, since I can easily get distracted. It comes with a very pretty satin drawstring bag, that will be great for putting it in my luggage.
SOFT, SHINY & SMOOTH HAIR
Leyla Milani Hair - No Crease, No Tug, Ouch-less design, hand dyed, Hair Accessories, Ponytail Holder, stretchy material 4pack, Best Hair Tie for Women, Teens, Girls - All Tied Up Hair Ties - msrp $18
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Item Form': 'Ribbon', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.5 x 3.4 x 0.4 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '855389006491'}
My hair is always breaking and coming off in my hair ties, so recently I have started replacing all my normal hair ties with hair items that are less damaging to my hair. I really like how these hold my long hair snug in a ponytail and they don’t pull on my hair when I take them out. I love the colors too, teal and black are my favorite colors.
LOVE THAT THEY DON’T PULL MY HAIR OUT WHEN I TAKE THEM OFF
Professional Hair Straightener, Inkint Ceramic Tourmaline Ionic Flat Iron Styling Iron with LCD Display, Adjustable Temperature, Dual Voltage,Instant Heat Up,Heat Resistant Glove
inkint
{'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'Inkint', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic Tourmaline', 'Color': 'Purple', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.98 x 4.33 x 2.17 inches; 1.46 Pounds', 'UPC': '882200488990'}
I can't believe how fast this flat iron heated up, it was like instantly. It has a nicely lit LCD screen. All the buttons are on the inside, which is good since I usually hit the controls on my hair curling wand because they are on the outside. The temperature is adjustable, I only needed it about halfway since I have a finer hair. It does come with a heat resistant glove, instructions and a carrying case/ storage bag. There is a little loop on the cord so you can hang it and the cord also rotates so it doesn't get all tangled up.
HEATS UP VERY FAST & WORKS GREAT
L’ange Hair Borago Borage Oil Deep Conditioning Masque | Powerful Nourishing Borage Oil for Hair | Ideal for Medium to Coarse Hair
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.6 x 3.6 x 2.5 inches; 10 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2113', 'UPC': '810108191612'}
I had bought myself a  heat cap for my hair because my hair is dry and it has really been thinning since I started becoming middle aged. My sister gave me this deep condition protein  hair mask a few months ago to try. I have been using it once a week and my hair is definitely a lot softer and shinier. The one thing that really sticks out is the smell, it is very pleasant and not over powering.
LEAVES HAIR SOFT & SHINY
Fascigirl Hair Claw Clip, 18 PCS Womens Jaw Clip Vintage Hair Clamp Hair Accessory for Bath Shower … (18 pcs claw clips)
Fascigirl

GREAT GRASP ON MY HAIR

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Demographics:** A family-oriented individual who enjoys cosmetic and hair care products, particularly tailored for her granddaughter and herself.
- **Product Usage:** Values versatile, high-quality beauty tools and accessories that enhance styling efficiency and travel convenience. Recently purchased a lightweight, dual-voltage hair straightener, reinforcing her interest in travel-friendly styling tools.
- **Quality Preference:** Prefers easy-to-clean products that emphasize practicality and hygiene while seeking customizable options for varying hair types, including frizzy textures.
- **Importance of Performance:** Prioritizes tools for flawless makeup application and hair styling, focusing on even distribution, long-lasting results, and gentle features. She has shown a preference for high-performing styling tools that heat up quickly and effectively manage her hair.
- **Feedback Behavior:** Actively engages in product reviews to discuss performance, ease of use, aesthetics, and functionality. Recently expressed enthusiasm for a dual-voltage hair straightener that meets her stylistic needs and travel aspirations.
- **Cosmetic Trends:** Interested in innovative solutions that offer customizable applications and maintain a focus on heat protection products that support a positive self-image.
- **Recent Engagement:** Shared a highly positive review of a nourishing hair product and commended the reliability of newly acquired accessories, emphasizing her commitment to family-friendly and high-performance beauty solutions.
